Greetings! First of all thank you for buying my app. Below you can find a few notes regarding its usage.
From the home menu open "Settings", edit your preferences (frame rate, stop after, keep screen on, resolution, start delay, etc…).
Note! If choose to keep the screen ON, the battery will drain faster.
Start recording from home menu/Play Button. Note that before the actually recording starts you can stop the process from the delay menu.
Note! When recording starts, do not close the app, you can close the screen or leave it, the screen will close by itself.
Note! If you change phone orientation during recording the app will stop current time lap. You can create either portrait or landscape time laps but not both in the same time.
You can view, share and remove all time laps from home menu/Movies. You can also access all created time laps within your gallery under InTimeVideos folder.

Note! When you remove a time lap from within the app, on some devices it is possible that you will still see its thumbnail in Gallery, however this will not show up anymore if you reboot the phone or trigger a media scan.
Note! While recording, you can see how many frames have been captured and for how long (in minutes) the recording was started.
There are no time laps at this time.
